name: harvest neck scarf
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
sizes_available: (58-65 x 2.75-3.5”/147-165 x 7-9 cm) adjustable depending on yarn weight and hook size used and what width you prefer
notes:
**a lovely taper-ended scarf with textured puff stitches down the center. customizable for length, width and yarn weight.** 

**size:** (58-65 x 2.75-3.5”/147-165 x 7-9 cm) adjustable depending on yarn weight and hook size used and what width you prefer

**stitches & techniques used:** chains, slip stitch, single crochet, double crochet, special stitch instructions

**yarn:** #3 dk weight, tippy tree yarns super dk – 100% superwash merino wool; 231 yds/100 g or #4 worsted weight, expression fiber arts buttery worsted – 100% superwash merino wool; 224 yds/100 g or suitable substitute; 190-230 total yards if you keep the size range stated above

**tools:** us size (g+/7) 4.5 mm crochet hook for dk weight, us size (i/9) 5.5 mm crochet hook for worsted weight, yarn needle, scissors, blocking materials

**other:** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns.
